name: The Graveyard Shift (Yippika)
description:
This is the result of  my first game  jam  made in 48 hours . Follow the story of a character that is struggling with the grief of losing a loved one. You will raid a graveyard over a series of nights in order to put back together a corpse. 

*This game was designed as an application and you may run into issues with the web version. For the best experience, download the game below to play.

All assets used are linked below. 

Textures:    https://angrysnail.itch.io/pixel-art-graveyard-tileset

Sound Effects:      https://kronbits.itch.io/freesfx

Music:  https://svl.itch.io/rpg-music-pack-svl

Come check out my portfolio: https://www.gonos.dev/
